TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract UCOMIConnectionPointContainer

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnumConnectionPoints(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIEnumConnectionPoints ppEnum) cil managed

Docs.param: On successful return, contains the interface pointer of the enumerator.
Docs.summary: Creates an enumerator of all the connection points supported in the connectable object, one connection point per IID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer::EnumConnectionPoints` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void FindConnectionPoint (ref Guid riid, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint ppCP);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void FindConnectionPoint(valuetype System.Guid riid, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint ppCP) cil managed

Docs.param: A reference to the outgoing interface IID whose connection point is being requested.
On successful return, contains the connection point that manages the outgoing interface `riid`.
Docs.summary: Asks the connectable object if it has a connection point for a particular IID, and if so, returns the interface pointer to that connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer::FindConnectionPoint` in the MSDN library.
